channel.title: Project Neon
channel.description:
[center][size=16pt]Project NEON[/size] [size=8pt]Nope, no crappy banner. You know why? I don't need one, and my GIMP died on me. Okay?[/size] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center] I got so [b]bored[/b] of my server (Trail To Hell) that I decided to start a "new" one, that I will probably finish and leave in anothers' hands... but we'll see, huh?
[i]Note to my TTH players - For god's sake, don't post "why leave TTH?" because I'm NOT! I'm just bored of the expansion and coding for TTH (I still will!) for now, so I am doing this...[/i]
Well, I need a small team only, since I do want this to be a great server like TTH but still not so big that we have 4 out of 50 coders... So, here's a list. [center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center] [center][b]Project NEON Team List:[/b] [i][u]Owner:[/u][/i] [i]1. Newb 2341 [u]Leaders[/u] 1. Sleep 2. Zamaorak Zxt 3. Oo Java[/i] [u]Coders:[/u] [i]1. n0vamage 2. teric6 3. r1ch kid 4. fishypoo101 5. xirus[/i] [u]Advertisers:[/u] [i]1. s4nta 2. unkn0wn 0wna 3.[/i][/center] [center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center] Not a huge team, but okay enough. Okay, now I'll let you post apps. Her's the format: [code][b]Application:[/b] [u]What Job(s) Going For:[/u] [u]Experience In That Job(s):[/u] [u]If Coding, Links To Tuts/Servers?:[/u] [u]Anything Else:[/u][/code] Use that to declare your soul - I mean life - I mean coding expertise to me. [center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center] Finally, or almost finally, I will only accept pretty good coders. Not saying that you won't be accepted - it all depends in the experience. So, start posting apps! :) [center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center] [b]Still don't want to join? Still think I'm a "noob?" I won't be angry, but... Check this link to see who you're dealing with before you get a bad idea.[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,97948.0.html]My server thread - 50 + pages?[/url] [center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center] [center][size=16pt]Project NEON[/size] [i]Life is deep - dive in! (c) Sleep[/i][/center]
